VpcEncryptionControlId.description: The ID of the VPC Encryption Control configuration.

State.description: The current state of the VPC Encryption Control configuration.

StateMessage.description: A message providing additional information about the encryption control state.

ResourceExclusions.InternetGateway.description: Specifies whether to exclude internet gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.InternetGateway.State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.
A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.EgressOnlyInternetGat.description: Specifies whether to exclude egress-only internet gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.
The current state of the exclusion configuration.
A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.NatGateway.description: Specifies whether to exclude NAT gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.NatGateway.State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.

ResourceExclusions.NatGateway.StateMessa.description: A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.VirtualPrivateGateway.description: Specifies whether to exclude virtual private gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.
The current state of the exclusion configuration.
A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.VpcPeering.description: Specifies whether to exclude VPC peering connection traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.VpcPeering.State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.

ResourceExclusions.VpcPeering.StateMessa.description: A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.VpcLattice.description: Specifies whether to exclude VPC Lattice traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.VpcLattice.State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.

ResourceExclusions.VpcLattice.StateMessa.description: A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.ElasticFileSystem.description: Specifies whether to exclude Elastic File System traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.ElasticFileSystem.Sta.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.
A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

ResourceExclusions.Lambda.description: Specifies whether to exclude Lambda function traffic from encryption enforcement.

ResourceExclusions.Lambda.State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.

ResourceExclusions.description: Information about resource exclusions for the VPC Encryption Control configuration.

State.description: The current state of the exclusion configuration.

StateMessage.description: A message providing additional information about the exclusion state.

VpcEncryptionControlExclusion.description:
Describes an exclusion configuration for VPC Encryption Control.

For more information, see [Enforce VPC encryption in transit](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-encryption-controls.html) in the *Amazon VPC User Guide* .

description:
Describes the configuration and state of VPC encryption controls.

For more information, see [Enforce VPC encryption in transit](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-encryption-controls.html) in the *Amazon VPC User Guide* .

EgressOnlyInternetGatewayExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude egress-only internet gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

ElasticFileSystemExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude Elastic File System traffic from encryption enforcement.

InternetGatewayExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude internet gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

LambdaExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude Lambda function traffic from encryption enforcement.

Mode.description: The encryption mode for the VPC Encryption Control configuration.

NatGatewayExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude NAT gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

Tags.description: The tags assigned to the VPC Encryption Control configuration.

VirtualPrivateGatewayExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude virtual private gateway traffic from encryption enforcement.

VpcId.description: The ID of the VPC for which to create the encryption control configuration.

VpcLatticeExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude VPC Lattice traffic from encryption enforcement.

VpcPeeringExclusionInput.description: Specifies whether to exclude VPC peering connection traffic from encryption enforcement.
